title: 18 Card Beater Lot w/T205, T206, T207, E90-1, E95, E96, C46 and more
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: 18 Card Beater Lot w/T205, T206, T207, E90-1, E95, E96, C46 and more
posts.post_content:
Listed for sale is an 18 card lot featuring a nice assortment of different caramel and tobacco types and sets.  As is apparent by the scans, all cards have serious condition issues such as trimming, paper loss, damage, heavy creasing, etc.  Still a good way to knock some cards off your checklists or add a few new types to your collection for a bargain price.  

$150 takes the entire lot delivered.  First e-mail or PM saying "I'll take it" reserves the lot.  Thanks for looking and please e-mail [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions.

Cards pictured are as follows:

T207 - Ed (Dixie) Walker
T206 - Mike Donlin
T206 - Thomas Leach
T206 - Vive Lindaman
T206 - Dan McGann
T206 - William O'Neil
T206 - Lou Ritter
T206 - Fred Snodgrass
T205 - George Stone
E90-1 - Lou Criger
E90-1 - George Stone
E90-1 - George Stovall
C46 - Ray Demmitt
E95 - Thomas Leach
E95 - Harry Krause
E96 - Harry Davis
1933 Goudey - Fred Schulte
1934-36 Diamond Stars - Earle Averill #35 HOF
